subject: Proposal: Volcano Survey Mission
body:
To the crew of the scout vessel,

Further to our discussion, I am writing to formalize the offer of employment.

=== THE JOB ===
Conduct a geological survey of Mount Salbarii using your ship's planetary survey equipment and seismic charges. A geologist visited approximately one year ago and assessed the volcano as 99% safe, but we need proper data to be certain.

The survey should take 2-3 days with proper equipment.

=== PAYMENT ===
Cr3000 in cash, payable upon delivery of the survey data.

=== YOUR SHIP ===
I understand you're looking for a scout ship stranded somewhere in our mountains. I can provide the exact location once we have an agreement - the ship is approximately 120 kilometers from the capital, near Mount Salbarii.

Perhaps we can be of mutual assistance.

Yours faithfully,

Alan Greener
Minister for Offworld Affairs, Public Relations & Fisheries
Government of Walston
